name.japanese: インペルダウン - レベル1 (紅蓮地獄)

description: The first level of Impel Down prison featuring a forest of red trees with blade-sharp leaves and knife-like grass. This is the exit point where prisoners attempt to escape to the outside.

keyEvents.title: Mr. 3 Creates Candle Wall
keyEvents.description: Galdino creates a Candle Wall to block Magellan's Hydra attack on Level 1.
keyEvents.significance: First demonstration that Mr. 3's wax can resist Magellan's poison.

keyEvents.title: Champion Luffy Created
keyEvents.description: Mr. 3 creates wax armor for Luffy on Level 1, enabling him to fight Magellan.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the key strategy to fight Magellan is developed.

keyEvents.title: Prisoners Reach the Exit
keyEvents.description: The escaped prisoners finally reach the exterior exit of Impel Down at Level 1.
keyEvents.significance: The moment of hope that turns to despair when they discover no Marine ships.

statusHistory.reason: Level 1 serves as the battleground and exit point during the prison break

name.japanese: インペルダウン - レベル2

description: The second level of Impel Down prison, known as the Beast Hell, featuring various dangerous beasts and monsters.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Magellan Round 2
keyEvents.description: Luffy returns to Level 2 to confront Magellan in their rematch.
keyEvents.significance: The battleground for the climactic confrontation between Luffy and Magellan.

statusHistory.reason: Level 2 is where Luffy confronts Magellan

name.japanese: インペルダウン - レベル3

description: The third level of Impel Down prison, known as Starvation Hell, where prisoners are given minimal food and water.

keyEvents.title: Ivankov and Inazuma's Defeat Location
keyEvents.description: Revealed that Ivankov and Inazuma were defeated by Magellan on Level 3 while trying to hold him off.
keyEvents.significance: The location where two key allies sacrificed themselves to buy time for the escape.

statusHistory.reason: Referenced as the location of Ivankov and Inazuma's defeat

name.japanese: インペルダウン外部湾

description: The waters immediately outside Impel Down prison in the Calm Belt, where Marine battleships normally dock and where Sea Kings lurk.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of Missing Ships
keyEvents.description: The prisoners reach the exterior and discover the Marine ships have been relocated.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Magellan's scheme is revealed to have worked.

keyEvents.title: Jinbe Uses Mizugokoro
keyEvents.description: Jinbe uses Fish-Man Jujutsu in the bay waters to manipulate currents.
keyEvents.significance: The waters where Jinbe demonstrates his water manipulation abilities.

keyEvents.title: Kairyu Ipponzeoi Launch
keyEvents.description: Jinbe launches prisoners onto a distant battleship using water currents from the bay.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the escape route is secured.

statusHistory.reason: The waters outside Impel Down during the escape attempt

description: A Marine battleship in the Calm Belt near Impel Down that becomes the target of Jinbe's escape plan. The ship is boarded by Buggy, Crocodile, and Mr. 1.

keyEvents.title: Prisoners Board the Battleship
keyEvents.description: Jinbe launches Buggy, Crocodile, and Mr. 1 onto this Marine battleship using Kairyu Ipponzeoi.
keyEvents.significance: The ship that becomes the prisoners' escape vessel.

keyEvents.title: Jinbe Pierces the Ship
keyEvents.description: Jinbe uses Uchimizu to pierce through the battleship diagonally from a distance.

statusHistory.reason: Battleship captured by escapees during this episode
